thread.title: Colorado Avalanche gets back to work, prepares for Boston Bruins

title: Colorado Avalanche gets back to work, prepares for Boston Bruins
text:
Published By: Denver Post Avalanche - Today 
After a day off, the Avalanche practiced Monday as its next opponent, the Boston Bruins, were playing their annual Columbus Day matinee in B...
